name: 知識組織專題研究
goals: 了解古今中外知識組織的理論與應用情境
了解當代知識組織的重要變革
了解當代知識組織重要發展趨勢
了解影響知識組織相關資訊科技
syllabus:
1\. Theories and Principles for Knowledge Organization  
2\. Technologies for Knowledge Organization  
3\. Program Development for Knowledge Resource Management  
4\. Challenges of Knowledge Organization  
5\. Organizing Knowledge in a Library Environment  
6\. Principles of Ontology  
7\. Technologies for Ontology  
8\. Semantic Web, IO issues and Trends

methodologies.note: 由授課教師介紹知識組織重要理論與發展
由同學進行閱讀報告及討論
同學進行期末專題報告發表
